```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
EuclideanNorm = function(x){
  res = sqrt(sum(x^2))
  return(res)
}
EuclideanNorm(c(1:5))
```

Write a loop function to calculate the Euclidean Norm of a vector

```{r}
x = c(3:16)
d = 0
for (i in 1 : length(x)){
  d = d + x[i]^2
  cat("Iteration =", i,  "value of x = ", x[i],"value of d =",d, "\n")
}
sqrt(d)
```
